attributes.action: Let Brexit happen on October 31st WITH or WITHOUT a deal.
attributes.additional_details:
We voted to leave the EU over three years ago.
A number of MP's are hell-bent of stopping Brexit come hell or high water.
We are a DEMOCRACY and should accept the will of the majority.
If we had voted to remain I would have accepted the decision.
attributes.background:
Accept the majority vote of the Referendum.
If we leave with a deal, let us regain all our powers and be shackled to the EU for nothing.
